meanings.definition: Superbugs: bacteria that are resistant to multiple antibiotics
meanings.sent1: The hospital is struggling to contain the spread of superbugs.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are concerned about the rise of superbugs in healthcare settings.
meanings.sent3: The superbugs in the lab were causing quite a commotion among the researchers.
meanings.sent4: The superbugs were like tiny warriors fighting off the antibiotics.
meanings.sent5: The image of superbugs invading the body is both fascinating and terrifying.

meanings.definition: Superbugs: a strain of bacteria that is difficult to treat and can cause serious infections
meanings.sent1: The new superbugs strain is spreading rapidly in the community.
meanings.sent2: Hospitals are on high alert for any cases of superbugs infections.
meanings.sent3: The superbugs at the picnic were definitely not the kind you want around your food!
meanings.sent4: Dealing with these superbugs felt like battling an invisible enemy.
meanings.sent5: The threat of superbugs lurking in everyday places is a real concern for public health.
